component.name: Hackathons
component.script:
function init() m.top.itemComponentName = "RowListItem" m.top.numRows = 2 m.top.itemSize = [270 * 3 + 20 * 2, 343] m.top.rowHeights = [400] m.top.rowItemSize = [ [270, 178], [270, 178], [270, 178] ] m.top.itemSpacing = [ 40, 0 ] m.top.rowItemSpacing = [ [20, 0] ] m.top.rowLabelOffset = [ [0, 30] ] m.top.rowFocusAnimationStyle = "floatingFocus" m.top.showRowLabel = [true, true] m.top.focusBitmapBlendColor = "#05acea" m.top.drawFocusFeedbackOnTop = false m.top.drawFocusFeedback = true m.top.useAtlas = false
m.hackathonReader = createObject("roSGNode", "AttrReader") m.hackathonReader.observeField("content","GetRowListContent") m.hackathonReader.contenturi = "https://c.gumgum.com/ads/com/drew_test/roku_content/hackathons.xml" m.hackathonReader.control = "RUN"
end function
function GetRowListContent() as object m.content = m.hackathonReader.content
m.rowOneListContent = m.content.getChild(0) m.rowTwoListContent = m.content.getChild(1)
myNode = CreateObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode")
lilNodeOne = myNode.CreateChild("ContentNode") for i = 0 to m.rowOneListContent.getChildCount() - 1 data = m.rowOneListContent.getChild(i) item = lilNodeOne.CreateChild("RowListItemData") item.posterUrl = data.HDGRIDPOSTERURL item.labelText = data.title end for m.top.content = myNode end function
